mapConstructorOnReadonlyTuple.ts(3,5): error TS2583: Cannot find name 'WeakMap'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to 'es2015' or later.

==== mapConstructorOnReadonlyTuple.ts (2 errors) ====
    const pairs = [[{}, 1], [{}, 2]] as const;
    new Map(pairs);
        ~~~
!!! error TS2583: Cannot find name 'Map'. Do you need to change your target library? Try changing the 'lib' compiler option to 'es2015' or later.
    new WeakMap(pairs);
        ~~~~~~~
